channel.title: Error on Alexander Makarov
channel.description: Recent content in Error on Alexander Makarov

item.title: YouTube's 500 error page
item.description: Just caught 500-error at YouTube. No one is safe from that, even the best projects but that’s not the point of the post. The thing is that the error page is more useful than majority of other error pages. Here’s why… What is different here is a long wall of “information”. You can not display anything useful in production since it would allow hackers to crack your project easier. But it would have been great because searching for particular user-reported error is, sometimes, a big pain.
